trans-unit.source: Provides information for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> 事件提供信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays in the window caption the number of times that the window has been resized.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序的窗口标题中显示的已调整窗口大小时的次数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the window being acted upon by the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> 方法正在执行的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The window being acted upon by the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize" /> methods.
The following code example creates an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.WindowEventArgs.Window%2A> property to display in the window caption the number of times that the window has been resized.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.WindowEventArgs.Window%2A>属性在窗口中显示标题的已调整窗口大小时的次数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
